key.name: saved-windows
key.description: Persisted window data serialized to JSON.

key.name: debug-logging
key.description: Write detailed logs about extension behavior.

key.name: config-version
key.description: Internal version number for configuration data format. Used for automatic migration between versions.

key.name: new-window-max-wait-ms
key.description: The maximum time to wait for a new window's title to be finalized. After this period, the window will be processed even if its title is still changing.

key.name: new-window-title-stability-ms
key.description: The time a new window's title must remain unchanged before it is considered stable and ready for processing.

key.name: generic-title-max-length
key.description: Maximum length for a title to be considered generic. Generic titles get extended wait times.

key.name: ambiguity-threshold
key.description: Similarity threshold above which windows with specific titles are considered ambiguous.

key.name: min-score-spread
key.description: Minimum difference between best and second-best match scores for confident matching.

key.name: generic-title-extended-wait
key.description: Extended wait time for windows with generic titles before forcing a decision.

key.name: max-unseen-age
key.description: Maximum age in seconds of a window that has not been seen before it is deleted.

key.name: match-threshold
key.description: Minimum threshold for matching restored windows.

key.name: freeze-saves
key.description: Do not update saved window data.

key.name: activate-workspace
key.description: Follow apps when they are moved to another workspace.
